actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gerridae makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Bred to the Saddle
special_abilities.desc: The gerridae can't be charmed or frightened while it has a rider.

special_abilities.name: Water Bound
special_abilities.desc: For every hour the gerridae spends on dry land, its hp maximum is reduced by 2 (1d4).

special_abilities.name: Water Walker
special_abilities.desc: The gerridae can move across the surface of water as if it were harmless, solid ground. This trait works like the water walk spell.
